channel.title: CVE Feed for Schlage -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Schlage -- all products

item.title: CVE-2020-9059|2024-09-16T19:25:18.358Z -- schlage -- be468
item.description: Z-Wave devices based on Silicon Labs 500 series chipsets using S0 authentication are susceptible to uncontrolled resource consumption leading to battery exhaustion. As an example, the Schlage BE468 version 3.42 door lock is vulnerable and fails open at a low battery level.
